The Sun Cloud APIs are RESTful and use JSON for their resource
represenatio=
ns <http://kenai.com/projects/suncloudapis/pages/CloudAPISpecificationResou=
rceModels>.
 They totally respect HATEOAS and are a great example from what=
 I've
seen so far.

Rich
